titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WOMEN NON-INVASIVE OR POSSIBLY MICRO-INVASIVE TOTAL - Description

div.p: WOMEN NON-INVASIVE OR POSSIBLY MICRO-INVASIVE TOTAL is the number of women whose BREAST BIOPSY REFERRAL OUTCOME was recorded as National Code 'Positive; i.e. cancer detected - non-invasive or possibly micro-invasive'.
